body_html: FYI, I committed a change to gloo to stop bundling NCCL itself. It will now happily pick up whatever NCCL you give it through NCCL_ROOT_DIR or by trying to find it in the standard systems paths. See facebookincubator/gloo@84c1c69. You do have to set -DUSE_NCCL=1 to make Gloo try and find it and compile in support.

body: FYI, I committed a change to gloo to stop bundling NCCL itself. It will now happily pick up whatever NCCL you give it through NCCL_ROOT_DIR or by trying to find it in the standard systems paths. See facebookincubator/gloo@84c1c69f919ff7230fde57e3a14831f16f61f0c9. You do have to set `-DUSE_NCCL=1` to make Gloo try and find it and compile in support.
